other_title: コスモスピンクショック (Japanese)
plot: Micchi thrusts though space on her spacecraft Pink Shock, hoping to be reunited with her long lost lover.
ending_theme: "Boy no Shinwa (ボーイの神話; Boy's Legend)" by Mayumi Tanaka and Chika Sakamoto
insert_song: "Cockpit wo Nozokanaide" (コックピットをのぞかないで) by Chika Sakamoto, Mayumi Tanaka
